definitions.title: chaff
definitions.body: (Talm. Targum [[מוֹחָא]], Ar. mawos.un straw );—´[[מ]] abs. Ho 13:3 + 6 t.; cstr. Is 17:13; —chaff, always as driven by wind, and alw. c. [[כְּ]], in sim.; of wicked Job 21:18 (‖[[רוּחַ תֶּבֶן לִפְנֵי]]), cf. Ps 1:4, Ps 35:5, Ho 13:8; of hostile nations Is 17:13 ([[הָרִים]] ´[[מ]]), Is 29:5 (‖[[אָבָק דַּח]]); hyperb. of Judah's power, [[גְּבָעוֹת כַּמׂץ תָּשִׂים]] Is 41:16 (‖[[הָרִים וְתָדׂק תָּדוּשׁ]]); of passing time, [[יוֹם]] Zep 2:2.
